mapper.select:
SELECT goods_id AS "goodsiI", goods_name AS "goodsName", goods_brand AS "goodsBrand", goods_price AS "goodsPrice", goods_purchs_link AS "goodsPurchsLink", goods_kwrd AS "goodsKwrd", goods_regist_date AS "goodsRegistDate", goods_update_date AS "goodsUpdateDate", goods_delete_yn AS "goodsDeleteYn"
FROM tb_goods
